feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:03 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
